prompt: Minimum Hours of Direct Sunlight for Each Building must be at least 2.8 hours per day.
cypher:
// OntoGraph terms
MERGE (C_Building:Class {iri:'ex:Building'}) SET C_Building.label='Building'
MERGE (DP_Sun:DatatypeProperty {iri:'ex:hasDirectSunlightHoursPerDay'}) SET DP_Sun.label='hasDirectSunlightHoursPerDay', DP_Sun.range='xsd:decimal'
MERGE (B_lt:Builtin {iri:'swrlb:lessThan'}) SET B_lt.label='lessThan'
MERGE (DP_V:DatatypeProperty {iri:'ex:violatesMinDirectSunlight'}) SET DP_V.label='violatesMinDirectSunlight', DP_V.range='xsd:boolean'
// MetaGraph rule + atoms
MERGE (r:Rule {id:'R_SOL_SUN_MIN_2p8_V'}) SET r.text='Building(?b)^hasDirectSunlightHoursPerDay(?b,?h)^swrlb:lessThan(?h,2.8)->violatesMinDirectSunlight(?b,true)', r.kind='violation'
MERGE (vb:Var {name:'?b'})
MERGE (vh:Var {name:'?h'})
MERGE (lit28:Literal {lex:'2.8', datatype:'xsd:decimal'})
MERGE (litT:Literal {lex:'true', datatype:'xsd:boolean'})
MERGE (a1:Atom {id:'R_SOL_SUN_MIN_2p8_V_A1', type:'ClassAtom'})
MERGE (a2:Atom {id:'R_SOL_SUN_MIN_2p8_V_A2', type:'DataPropertyAtom'})
MERGE (a3:Atom {id:'R_SOL_SUN_MIN_2p8_V_A3', type:'BuiltinAtom'})
MERGE (h1:Atom {id:'R_SOL_SUN_MIN_2p8_V_H1', type:'DataPropertyAtom'})
MERGE (r)-[:HAS_BODY {order:1}]->(a1)
MERGE (r)-[:HAS_BODY {order:2}]->(a2)
MERGE (r)-[:HAS_BODY {order:3}]->(a3)
MERGE (r)-[:HAS_HEAD {order:1}]->(h1)
MERGE (a1)-[:REFERS_TO]->(C_Building)
MERGE (a2)-[:REFERS_TO]->(DP_Sun)
MERGE (a3)-[:REFERS_TO]->(B_lt)
MERGE (h1)-[:REFERS_TO]->(DP_V)
MERGE (a1)-[:ARG {pos:1}]->(vb)
MERGE (a2)-[:ARG {pos:1}]->(vb)
MERGE (a2)-[:ARG {pos:2}]->(vh)
MERGE (a3)-[:ARG {pos:1}]->(vh)
MERGE (a3)-[:ARG {pos:2}]->(lit28)
MERGE (h1)-[:ARG {pos:1}]->(vb)
MERGE (h1)-[:ARG {pos:2}]->(litT)
